title: Lakehouse Fundamentals
subtitle: Build your first Delta Lake table and understand the lakehouse architecture
description: Learn the core concepts of the lakehouse paradigm, Delta Lake storage, and how to create, query, and manage tables in Databricks.

sideQuests.title: Delta Lake: The Open Source Engine

concepts.question: What is a lakehouse architecture?
concepts.answer: A data management architecture that combines the low-cost, open-format storage of a data lake with the reliability and performance of a data warehouse.

concepts.question: What is Delta Lake?
concepts.answer: An open-source storage framework that provides ACID transactions, scalable metadata handling, and schema enforcement on top of data lakes.
concepts.hint: Think of it as adding warehouse-like reliability to a data lake.

concepts.question: What is the Unity Catalog in Databricks?
concepts.answer: A unified governance solution for all data and AI assets in a Databricks workspace, providing centralized access control, auditing, lineage, and data discovery.
